title: Readout of Vice President Biden’s Meeting with President Hashim Thaci of Kosovo | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
January 12, 2017

 



Readout of Vice President Biden’s Meeting with President Hashim Thaci of Kosovo





	Vice President Joe Biden met with President of Kosovo Hashim Thaci yesterday. The Vice President reiterated U.S support for Kosovo's continued development and full international integration. He encouraged the government of Kosovo to continue to make progress in the Dialogue with Serbia‎ and to implement reforms to address corruption and foster economic growth in Kosovo.
